section1.title: The Rise of Safe Treatment Abroad
section1.paragraph: Medical tourism is booming, with experts predicting the global market will surpass $200 billion by 2030, driven largely by patients from conflict zones seeking stability and top-tier care.

section2.title: Advantages of Top Destinations
section2.paragraph: Germany leads in cardiology, oncology, and neurology with low crime rates and clear protocols; Turkey excels in cosmetic surgery, dentistry, and IVF with flexible pricing; Spain offers top orthopedics, rehabilitation, and aesthetic medicine in a warm climate and friendly service.
